name: Antz: The Picnic Simulator
description:
How to Win 

Gather your ant comrades and lead them to food for your colony. Larger objects require more ants working together to return food to the anthill, but are worth more points for your colony! Earn as many points as you can before the timer runs out.

How to Play

Use WASD to move your leader ant around the map.

Bump into the anthill to gather ants.

Lead your ants around the map to find some food. Make sure you have enough ants to pick it up!

  Once you’re close to some food, hold down SPACE to command your ants to pick up the food, then lead your comrades back home with your haul. Make sure you stay close to your ants, or they’ll forget where to go and freeze. 

And above all, watch out for the STOMP! 

Press M to mute.

Press R to restart.

Built for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1!

Credits:

Made by Sturph, Omlahid, and MellowMoose.

Font is 8-bit Operator. All music and art was made during the course of the jam.

Made with Unity, Piskel, lmms, and bfxr.
